entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IdnMapping.GetAscii and GetUnicode throw ArgumentException on Linux #107900
  • Source generated JSON deserialization fails with `JsonExtensionData` property using `init` accessor #107898
  • [9.0] Timeout - [Long Running Test] 'Wasm.Build.Tests.TestAppScenarios.LazyLoadingTests.LoadLazyAssemblyBeforeItIsNeeded #107897
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Win32.SystemEventsTests.UserPreferenceTests.SignalsUserPreferenceEventsAsynchronouslyOnThemeChanged #107894
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorSpanTests.TensorExtensionsSpanInTOut<Single> #107893
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_18884/GitHub_18884/GitHub_18884.cmd #107892
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_55253/Runtime_55253/Runtime_55253.cmd #107891
    10.0.0
  • windows/x86: Debug vs. Release - Avx512F.VL.TernaryLogic returns different result #107890
    9.0.0
  • Provide a debug clr or enable debug message in the binaries? #107884
  • [wasm] Excessive syscalls during DLL load #107883
    10.0.0
  • Segmentation fault during app startup on .NET6 #107876
  • JsImportObjectArray test fails with `null` instead of `System.Exception: test` #107873
  • Performance regression with JsonObject creation by +70% #107869
    9.0.0
  • [android][infra] Validate .NET 9 Android functionality across different API versions #107868
    10.0.0
  • [Android][crypto] Android 7 crashes in `AsymmetricDSASignature` #107867
    10.0.0
  • Support using COM Wrappers generators for UnmanagedType.IUnknown #107864
  • ClaimsPrincipal.SelectPrimaryIdentity allocates unnecessary enumerator #107861
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonSerializer.SerializeAsync returning string #107860
    Future
  • Add tests for structs with InlineArray attribute #107857
    10.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinding source generator ignores init-only properties without warning #107856
    10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT][Proposal] GC stress support for NativeAOT #107850
    10.0.0
  • Remove IVT from System.Collections.Immutable #107848
    Future

Closed

  • System.Numerics.Tensors Non-monotonic constructor errors #106538
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors Incorrect IndexOutOfRangeException on empty slice #106536
    9.0.0
  • Httpclient throwing Response ended Prematurely #106322
  • windows/x86: Assertion failed 'unreached' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #107587
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'unreached' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #107324
    9.0.0
  • Refactor and Update Main Workflow Documentation #76896
    Future
  • StreamWriter constructor documentation mismatch with implementation #106237
    Future
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Remove `unsafe` from APIs that do not use pointers. #104845
    10.0.0
  • Is hashcode comparison necessary in DefaultFrozenDictionary GetValueRefOrNullRefCore? #107866
  • TarWriter writes badly formatted size field for a zero sized regular file #95354
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.UseWindowsServiceTests.CanCreateService #107240
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.ExceptionOnStartIsPropagated #107671
    10.0.0
  • [mono][Perf] Disabled HAS_CUSTOM_BLOCKS causing regressions on MonoAOT, MonoInterpreter arm64 on 8/23/2024 12:30:35 PM #107308
    9.0.0
  • [android][infra] Validate .NET 9 Android functionality across different API versions #106717
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ArrayRecord.TotalElementsCount #106644
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Static constructor interpreter does not support spans #107541
    Future
  • System.Numerics.Tensors constructor safety #106534
    9.0.0
  • Why is the documentation so bad? #20908

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the workload band version #107899
    needs-area-label
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Replace VectorXx.Exp's edge case fallback with scalar processing #107886
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Branding for GA #107879
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Test only change - Ensure we create new RemoteInvokeOptions for every call #107875
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix RegexOptions.Compiled|IgnoreCase perf when dynamic code isn't supported #107874
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove InternalsVisibleTo from System.Collections.Immutable. #107872
    area-System.Collections, 10.0.0
  • Update internal macOS image in xplat-setup.yml #107871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [Swift interop] Add inline array struct lowering tests #107859
    area-Interop-coreclr, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono
  • Fixing SetSlice, Reshape, TryCopyTo. #107852
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Fix RegexOptions.Compiled|IgnoreCase perf when dynamic code isn't supported #107877
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • instrumentation (mostly) for DATAS #107853
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix HashSet copy constructor handling of instances that have fallen back to the randomized hashcode generator. (#107613) #107685
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix constraint on FrozenSet.{Try}GetAlternateLookup #107847
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Include .NET version in templates package id #107628
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Revert "Avoid taking lock for empty bucket in ConcurrentDictionary.TryRemove …" #107655
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix JsonSchemaExporter support for global UnmappedMemberHandling settings. #107604
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix the operands of NI_AVX512F_TernaryLogic during lowering #107882
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Increase timeout for SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test #107120
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, test-bug, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Fix crash in emit_llvmonly_handler_start #107590
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/9.0] [mono] Fix swizzle_mask type #107602
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/9.0] instrumentation (mostly) for DATAS #107888
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107814
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Turn on EventLog 8.0.1 #107896
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, 8.0.10
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106700
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/9.0] Fixing 0 length issue with constructor #107881
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/9.0] Empty slice fix #107880
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [PERF] Move performance testing logic into python scripts #101143
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Update ABI doc #107286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/9.0] Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107708
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [mono][mini] Prefer calling llvmaot compiled method instead of inlining it with JIT #107851
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fixing 0 length issue with constructor #107427
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Empty slice fix #107316
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix the operands of NI_AVX512F_TernaryLogic during lowering #107813
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Overhaul Main Workflow Docs #107415
    documentation, 10.0.0
  • Mark Encoding as nullable in StreamWriter's constructor #106658
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove redundant unsafe from SVE APIs #107854
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Ensure we create new RemoteInvokeOptions for every call #107820
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [release/9.0] Remove redundant !fgIsCommaThrow(morphedTree) assert #107760
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] instrumentation (mostly) for DATAS #107858
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] ARM64-SVE: Fix hwintrinsics flags #107802
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix typo in comment of SAVE_ARGUMENT_REGISTERS #106011
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0]: ARM64-SVE: Allow SVE ops to re-use the same registers #107818
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable ICU package for Apple mobile builds #107855
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix constraint on FrozenSet.{Try}GetAlternateLookup #107846
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [NRBF] Address issues discovered by Threat Model #106629
    new-api-needs-documentation, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • [mono][mini] Prefer calling llvmaot compiled method instead of inlining it with JIT #107401
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [NRBF] Comments and bug fixes from security review #107735
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Allow preinitializing spans created from arrays #107575
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch a couple properties to new VMR properties #107805
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fixing System.Array constructor #107266
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors

Updated

  • [release/9.0] NRBF Fuzzer and bug fixes #107788
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] BinaryFormatter tests improvements #107540
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Extend jump tables #107831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2539954 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Emscripten version reference for RTM build #106881
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • More doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107810
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #107591
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Remove static monitor helper functions #107667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Implement ProcessStartInfo.InheritHandles for Windows #107836
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • JIT: use explicit cast away GC when passing byref to unmanaged callees #107811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Allow to build browser in library mode #106388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-browser
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement Vector.AddSaturate/SubtractSaturate #107193
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Modernize C# generation tools under coreclr/inc #106719
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Add Haiku support for CoreCLR/PAL #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • ARM64: Fix lsra for AdvSimd_LoadAndInsertScalar #107786
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Verify Apple mobile platforms on iOS 17 and XCode 15 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Fix wrong drive format on Unix #107365
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Disable robust mutexes in PAL on Qemu #106123
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.119, windows: 128.0.6613.120 #107504
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • First-class Span #107737
    needs-area-label
  • [WASI] HTTP trailers #107795
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • fix OS detection for test scripts #107796
    area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix a possible infinite wait for GC completion at process shutdown. #107844
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement volatile barrier APIs #107843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Missing main export when using `IlcExportUnmanagedEntrypoint=true` #2433
  • [Swift Bindings] Integrate MachO.cs from xamarin-macios #2663

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: consider using the LLVM nuw and nsw operations for add #2256
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Review decision to include pthreads in WASI build and Wait #2295

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add MachO to read symbols #2686

Updated

  • Added documentation for binding most of the Swift types #2678

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet list package --vulnerable` too verbose / poor SNR #43480
  • NET9 SDK copies (new) file for transitive dependency #43474
  • Building an ASP.NET project 2-10x slower with .NET 9 vs .NET 8 #43470
  • dotnet watch run or build suddenly started failing with Sdk.Web, > 8.0.206 and Paket. #43468
  • dotnet ef commands are not finding .NET in nixOS #43467
  • 8.0.401 SDK generates incorrect assemblyVersion deps.json string for referenced projects #43466
  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 RC2 creating 8.0/6.0 project requires October Servicing (8.0.10/6.0.35) feeds. #43465

Closed

  • publish on debian 11 task exec clang fails #43462

PullRequests

Created

  • Unstable branding with rtm label and empty iteration #43483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the formatting of the onelocbuildconditional #43482
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43481
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove old source-build controls #43479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • ExcludeFromSourceBuild->ExcludeFromSourceOnlyBuild #43477
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Correctly handle different architectures of the SDK #43471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #43469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies (#40725) #43393
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up error experience when downloading non-tools #43045
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx
  • Add "not installed" and other messages for workloads #43472
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Don't forward along binlog arguments to runnable applications #43430
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [release/9.0.1xx] manually port the loc build update #43475
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.1 September 2024 Updates #43396
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Patch for Source-Build Stage 2 FSharp FS0064 Warnings #43436
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable stage-2 builds #43439
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.1 September 2024 Updates #43363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43440
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43441
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add Dev Device ID #43360
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Publish prebuilt reports for each repo #43336
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Re-rename to Roles and Extensions #8431
  • [Open issue]: static abstract interfaces and static classes #5783
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change property to method refactoring crashes when property used in property pattern #75135
  • Support updating resource files during Hot Reload/EnC #75133
  • Add "Copy Error Message Text" button to syntax error popups in the Visual Studio text editor #75131
  • Provide a means to automatically generate declarations for out parameters to a method #75130
  • Collapse to Definition when loading a file #75129
  • Create Required Property in C# with propr #75128
  • Visual Studio unable to suggest "using static" expressions as quick fix #75127
  • Style-Consistent Code Autocomplete #75126
  • Customizable Exclamation Mark (!) Color in C# #75125
  • Setting to fully qualify automatic imports of missing 'using' directive #75124
  • borders for selected reference #75123
  • IDE0078: Code Cleanup applied IDE0078 and broke the code #75122
    Backlog

Closed

  • Duplicate `.override method` generation #73338
    17.12

PullRequests

Created

  • Test EnC document diagnostics in non-host workspace #75140
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use MSBuild globs to determine which file changes are relevant #75139
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Include workspace kind in error message for easier diagnostics #75137
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • ExcludeFromSourceBuild->ExcludeFromSourceOnlyBuild #75136
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fix the SmartRename button regressions #75134
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • Do not attempt to report EnC diagnostics for non-host workspaces #75138
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Allow Razor to get diagnostics for cohosting #75102
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove some obsolete build properties #75096
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next
  • Test and document Span breaking changes #75079
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

Updated

  • Merge latest bits from 'main' branch into extensions branch #75090
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Field-backed properties: definite assignment #75116
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Upgrade xUnit #75068
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Exclude identifiers in misplaced attributes from identifier map #75100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP logging #74090
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Better Collection Expression Conversion From Expression #74993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, New Feature - ParamsCollections, 17.12
  • Adjust IsMetadataVirtual assertion in MethodToClassRewriter #75066
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Add `Enumerable.Reverse(this T[])` polyfill #75104
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Verify that semantic snippets obey IDE preferences #75073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio Browser Link trashes response compression #57905
  • AddIdentityApiEndpoints breaks Blazor's RedirectToLogin behavior. #57900
  • Feature Request: Hide or Disable Specific ASP.NET Core Identity Endpoints and Return Bearer Tokens via SignInManager #57899
  • Dockerized ASP.NET Core Blazor .NET 9 RC 1 static assets issue #57898
  • .Net 9 RC1 - Cannot set reponse headers when returning IAsyncEnumerable in controller #57895
  • FromQueryAttribute + argument type with a Action property will cause serious memory leaks #57892
  • JsonOptions Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi formatting #57891
  • Blazor Minify JSON #57884
  • Blazor Minify Isolated CSS - Built in Feature #57883
  • `No client method with the name found` warning when running application in the Development environment #57881

Closed

  • Perf regression: mvc, plaintext #57879
  • Perf regression: json_spring #57877
  • Perf improvement: mvc #57885
  • Authentication: Support for OAuth 2.0 for Native Apps Flow in ASP.NET Core #57838
  • Blazor nested [SupplyParameterFromQuery] causes exception on navigation #57746
  • ASP.NET Core Identity Documentation and samples #49668
    9.0-rc2
  • Incorrect XML documentation for IUserAuthenticatorKeyStore #57832
    Backlog
  • Issue with Swashbuckle when starting the api (v17.11) #57861
  • .NET 9 rc1 - script importmap not behaving as expected when App.razor is rendered. #57872
  • Blazor Deprecated Error in Lighthouse - UnloadHandler #57882
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json_middleware #57865
  • HttpClient GetAsync always return Not found not hitting API method immediately returning without response #57616
  • No interop methods are registered for renderer 1 #57730

PullRequests

Created

  • Add public method to QuickGrid to close column options UI #57904
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Add output and retries to AddressRegistrationTests #57903
    needs-area-label
  • throw an exception on id.get if session is not available #57902
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Unquarantine ShutdownTestWaitForShutdown #57901
    area-hosting
  • [IGNORE] Try to flush out #27157 #57897
    * NO MERGE *, area-networking
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57893
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rc.2.24464.3 #57887
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Update branding to rtm #57907
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Update milestones for rc2/rtm #57906
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [Templates] Updates libraries dependencies content #57863
    area-ui-rendering, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] [Templates] Updates libraries dependencies content #57864
    Servicing-approved, area-ui-rendering, 9.0-rc2
  • Fix unmatched paren in comment #57752
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix mapping for nested schemas and [Produces] attributes in OpenAPI implementation #57852
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-rc2
  • Fix parameter description in GetAuthenticatorKeyAsync #57834
    area-identity, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Allow ShowColumnOptionsAsync method to accept null parameter #56991
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    analyzer, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • feat: DefaultOutputCachePolicyProvider added #57362
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • feat: extending `ApiBehaviorOptions` with skip `SkipStatusCodePages` #57597
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Feature: dotnet-counters should allow users to request that a provider_name only binds to an EventSource #3805
    8.0.0

Updated

  • Crashing attempting to call `dumplog` #4446

    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to validate .IPA file because of AppIcon missed #24796
  • Default .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid App fails to run on Windows 11 with Visual Studio 17.11.2 #24795
  • +[IMKClient subclass]: chose IMKClient_Legacy +[IMKInputSession subclass]: chose IMKInputSession_Legacy macOS 15.0 #24794
  • Blask Screen when resuming iOS App when debugging #24793
  • Error in Xamarin .Shared.targets #24790
  • Strange behaviour after migrating MonoAndroid/Xamarin.iOS project to .net-android/.net-ios #24789
  • Windows local notification using Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.Notifications #24788
  • Back navigation does not work after traversing the first page in a 10 page stack with Shell Navigation #24787
  • AppX Deployment operation failed for package XXXX with error 0x80073CFB. The specific error text for this failure is: Another user has already installed an unpackaged version of this app. The current user cannot replace this with a packaged version. The conflicting package is XXX and it was published by CN=User Name. #24786
  • [iOS] [8.0.90] Images not showing up #24784
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #24783
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Android crashing when rotating a flyout page #24779

Closed

  • Linebreaks in XAML content is not persistent during HotReload #24770
  • Shell navigation back is not working after update 2 NuGet packages 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls' and 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility' #24555
    .NET 8 SR9

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Provided consistent behavior of text color in tabbed page in all platforms. #24782
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Fixed NavigationPage Title property #24781
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Avoid throwing in async void when applying relative source bindings #24780
    area-xaml

Merged

  • Update bug-report.yml with 8.0.90 SR9 #24791

Updated

  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator
  • [Localization] Remove check not allowing translations to run on net9.0 #24724
    area-localization
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changing - fix #24766
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Adds a rendering performance test #24762
    area-layout, area-testing, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Update merge main net9 #24759
    area-infrastructure
  • Compressed layout is back (maybe?) #24758
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control. #24683
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [xaml] fix potential NRE in `{Binding}` #24756
    area-xaml
  • [Android] - Fixed Flickering Issue When Toggling WebView Visibility #24753
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • Improve MauiFactory performance by avoiding reflection to get base classes #24775
    area-core-hosting, community ✨
  • Adding items to windows ObservableItemTemplateCollection #24777
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Improve keyboard scrolling with editors, contentInsets, and different keyboards #24589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview, area-keyboard
  • Add Padding for iOS Buttons in some scenarios #24760
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-picker

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dataverse reverse engineering - foreign keys #34686
  • Can persist IEnumerable<string>, but not retrieve #34685
  • config drop existing #34683
  • Combination of IgnoreQueryFilters with Max throws exception. #34682
  • Dynamically loaded assemblies #34681

Closed

  • Connection Timeout #34671

PullRequests

Created

  • Add all precompiled query tests to the same collection. #34692
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34691
  • Allow using foreign keys in Dataverse reverse engineering #34689

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.1.6 to 5.2.2 #34688
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • branding for rc2 #34690
  • Fix Azure SQL tests #34676
  • Enable NuGetAudit #34650
  • Remove unused variable #34680

Updated

  • Move runtime override to tests #34535
    blocked

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-16
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Backport one specific package upgrade that was missed #20139
    Branch Lockdown

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #20141
